name: Sarwar
text: Kaf. Ha. Ya. Ain. Sad.

name: Sarwar
text: This is the story of the blessing of your Lord to His servant Zachariah.

name: Sarwar
text: When he quietly called his Lord

name: Sarwar
text: and said, "My Lord, my bones have become feeble and my hair has turned white with age. Yet I have never been deprived in receiving from You the answer to my prayers.

name: Sarwar
text: I am afraid of what my kinsmen will do after (my death) and my wife is barren. Lord, grant me a son

name: Sarwar
text: who will be my heir and the heir of the family of Jacob. Lord, make him a person who will please you".

name: Sarwar
text: We answered his prayers with the glad news of the birth of a son by the name of John and told him, "We have never given such a name to anyone else."

name: Sarwar
text: He said, "Lord, how can I have a son? My wife is barren and I have reached an extremely old age".

name: Sarwar
text: (The angel) said, "This is true, but your Lord says, 'For Me it is easy; I created you when you did not exist".

name: Sarwar
text: Zachariah asked, " Lord, show me evidence (if this is a heavenly news)." The Lord said, "The evidence for it is that you must not speak (to any mortal) though you are in good health for three nights (and days)."

name: Sarwar
text: Zachariah came out to his people from place of worship and inspired them to glorify the Lord both in the morning and evening.

name: Sarwar
text: We commanded John, Zachariah's son, to follow the guidance of the Lord with due steadfastness. To John We gave knowledge and wisdom to John during his childhood.

name: Sarwar
text: We gave him compassion and purity. He was a pious human being,

name: Sarwar
text: kind to his parents, not arrogant or a rebellious person.

name: Sarwar
text: He was born and died in peace and will be brought back to life again in peace.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), mention in the Book (the Quran) the story of Mary how she left her family and started living in a solitary place to the East

name: Sarwar
text: out of her people's sight. We sent Our Spirit to her, who stood before her in the shape of a well formed human being.

name: Sarwar
text: Mary said, "Would that the Beneficent God would protect me from you. Leave me alone if you are a God fearing person".

name: Sarwar
text: He said, "I am the Messengers of your Lord. I have come to give you a purified son".

name: Sarwar
text: She said, "How can I have a son when no mortal has touched me nor am I an unchaste woman".

name: Sarwar
text: He said, "This is true but your Lord says, "It is very easy for Me. We have decided to give you a son as evidence (of Our existence) for human beings and a mercy from Us. This is a decree already ordained."

name: Sarwar
text: She conceived the child and retreated with him to a distant and solitary place.

name: Sarwar
text: When she started to experience (the pain of) of childbirth labor, by the trunk of a palm tree in sadness she said, "Would that I had died long before and passed into oblivion."

name: Sarwar
text: Then she heard the baby saying, "Do not be sad. Your Lord has caused a stream to run at your feet.

name: Sarwar
text: If you shake the trunk of the palm tree, it will provide you with fresh ripe dates.

name: Sarwar
text: Eat, drink, and rejoice. Should you see a person going by, tell him that on this day you have promised the Beneficent God to fast and never talk to any human being."

name: Sarwar
text: She took him to her people and they said, "Mary, this is indeed an strange thing.

name: Sarwar
text: Aaron's sister, your father was not a bad man nor was your mother unchaste".

name: Sarwar
text: She pointed to the baby (and referred them to him for their answer). They said, "How can we talk to a baby in the cradle?"

name: Sarwar
text: He said, "I am the servant of God. He has given me the Book and has appointed me to be a Prophet.

name: Sarwar
text: He has blessed me no matter where I dwell, commanded me to worship Him and pay the religious tax for as long as I live.

name: Sarwar
text: He has commanded me to be good to my parents and has not made me an arrogant rebellious person.

name: Sarwar
text: I was born with peace and I shall die and be brought to life again with peace."

name: Sarwar
text: Such was the true story of Jesus, the son of Mary, about which they dispute bitterly.

name: Sarwar
text: God is too Exalted to have a son. When He decides to bring some thing into existence He needs only command it to exist and it comes into existence.

name: Sarwar
text: (Baby Jesus said), "Worship God who is my Lord as well as yours. This is the straight path".

name: Sarwar
text: (The followers of Jesus) turned themselves into quarrelling sects. The disbelievers shall face a woeful condition on the great Day (of Judgment).

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), how clearly they will hear and see on the day when they will be brought into Our presence. Today the wrong doers are in manifest error.

name: Sarwar
text: Warn them of the woeful day when the final decree will be issued; they are neglectful and faithless.

name: Sarwar
text: We are the heirs of the earth and those living in it will all return to Us.

name: Sarwar
text: Mention the story of Abraham, the truthful Prophet, in the Book (the Quran)

name: Sarwar
text: who asked his father, "Father, why do you worship something that can neither hear nor see nor help you at all?

name: Sarwar
text: Father, I have received the knowledge which has not been given to you. Follow me; I shall guide you to the right path.

name: Sarwar
text: Father, do not worship satan; he has disobeyed the Beneficent God.

name: Sarwar
text: Father, I am afraid that the Beneficent God's torment will strike you and you will become a friend of satan."

name: Sarwar
text: His father replied, "Abraham, are you telling me to give-up my gods? If you will not stop this, I shall stone you to death. Leave my house and do not come back again".

name: Sarwar
text: Abraham said, "Peace be with you. I shall ask my Lord to forgive you; He has been gracious to me.

name: Sarwar
text: I shall stay away from you and what you worship instead of God. I worship my Lord and hope that my prayers will not be ignored."

name: Sarwar
text: When (Abraham) rejected his people and what they worshipped instead of God, We gave him Isaac and Jacob and made both of them Prophets.

name: Sarwar
text: We granted them Our blessing and high renown.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), mention in the Book (the Quran) the story of Moses. Moses was a sincere person, a Messengers and a Prophet.

name: Sarwar
text: We called him from the right side of Mount Sinai and drew him close for communication.

name: Sarwar
text: Out of Our mercy We gave him his brother Aaron who himself was a Prophet.

name: Sarwar
text: Mention in the Book (the Quran) the story of Ishmael; he was true to his promise, a Messengers and a Prophet.

name: Sarwar
text: He would order his people to worship God and pay the religious tax. His Lord was pleased with him.

name: Sarwar
text: Mention in the Book (the Quran) the story of Idris (Enoch); he was a truthful Prophet.

name: Sarwar
text: We granted him a high position.

name: Sarwar
text: These were the Prophets from the offspring of Adam, from those who embarked with Noah and from the offspring of Abraham and Israel. God guided them and chose them for His favor. Whenever they would hear the revelations of the Beneficent God they would bow down in prostration with tears.

name: Sarwar
text: They were succeeded by a generation who neglected their prayers and followed their worldly desires. They will certainly be lost,

name: Sarwar
text: but those among them who repent and become righteously striving believers will be admitted to the gardens without experiencing any injustice.

name: Sarwar
text: They will be admitted to the garden of Eden which is the unseen promise of the Beneficent God to His servants. The promise of God will certainly come true.

name: Sarwar
text: They will not hear therein any meaningless words. They will be greeted (by the angels) with "Peace be with you," and they will receive their sustenance both in the mornings and evenings.

name: Sarwar
text: Such are the gardens which We will give to Our God-fearing servants as their inherited property.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), we (the angels) do not come to you without being commanded by your Lord to do so. To Him belongs all that is before us, behind us, and in between. Your Lord is not forgetful.

name: Sarwar
text: He is the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them. Worship Him and be steadfast in your worship of Him; none is equal to Him.

name: Sarwar
text: The human being says, "Shall I be brought to life again after I will die?"

name: Sarwar
text: Does he not remember that We created him when he did not exist?

name: Sarwar
text: By your Lord, We will bring them back to life with satan and gather them around hell in large groups.

name: Sarwar
text: Then We will separate from every group those who were strongly rebellious against the Beneficent God.

name: Sarwar
text: We know best who deserves greater suffering in hell fire.

name: Sarwar
text: It is the inevitable decree of your Lord that every one of you will be taken to hell.

name: Sarwar
text: We will save the pious ones from the hell fire and leave the unjust people therein in crowded groups.

name: Sarwar
text: When Our revelations are recited to them, the unbelievers say to the faithful ones, "Which of us is more prosperous?"

name: Sarwar
text: How many generations of greater prosperity and splendor have We destroyed before them?

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), tell them, "The Beneficent God gives respite to those who have gone astray only until they face the torment with which they were threatened or to the Day of Judgment. Then they will find out who will have the most miserable place and the weakest forces.

name: Sarwar
text: God further enlightens those who seek guidance. To those who do charitable deeds which produce continuing benefits, your Lord will give a better reward and a better place in Paradise.

name: Sarwar
text: Note the words of the disbeliever, "I shall certainly be given wealth and children?"

name: Sarwar
text: Has he the knowledge of the unseen or has the Beneficent God established such a binding agreement with Him?

name: Sarwar
text: Absolutely not, We will record his words and prolong his punishment.

name: Sarwar
text: All that he speaks of will belong to Us, and he will come into Our presence all alone.

name: Sarwar
text: They have sought honor from other gods instead of God.

name: Sarwar
text: In fact, they can have no honor; their gods will renounce their worship of idols and will turn against them.

name: Sarwar
text: Do you not realize that We have sent Satan to incite the unbelievers to sin.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), exercise patience; We have given them respite only for an appointed time.

name: Sarwar
text: On the Day of Judgment, when the pious people will be brought into the presence of the Beneficent God as the guests of honor

name: Sarwar
text: and the criminals will be driven and thrown into hell,

name: Sarwar
text: no one will be able to intercede for the others except those whom the Beneficent God has given authority.

name: Sarwar
text: They have said that the Beneficent God has given birth to a son.

name: Sarwar
text: This is certainly a monstrous lie!

name: Sarwar
text: This would almost cause the heavens to rent apart, the earth to cleave asunder and the mountains to crumble down in fragments,

name: Sarwar
text: to ascribe a son to the Beneficent God.

name: Sarwar
text: The Beneficent God is too Exalted to have a son.

name: Sarwar
text: All that is in the heavens and the earth will return to the Beneficent God as His submissive servants.

name: Sarwar
text: He has counted and enumerated them one by one.

name: Sarwar
text: Everyone on the Day of Judgment will individually come into the presence of God.

name: Sarwar
text: To the righteously striving believers God will grant love.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), We have given you the Book (the Quran) in your own language so that you could easily give the glad news to the pious ones and warn the quarrelsome ones.

name: Sarwar
text: How many generations living before them did We destroy? Do you find anyone of them around or do you even hear any word from them?
